author: Gina Mei
title: Everything You Need to Know About Netflix's 2017 Line-Up
text:
Everything You Need to Know About Netflix's 2017 Line-Up 
(So far.) By Gina Mei Feb 09, 2017 It's only been a little over a month, but it's already clear 2017 is going to be a big year for Netflix. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Hot on the heels of Santa Clarita Diet, A Series of Unfortunate Events , and multiple amazing stand-up comedy specials, Netflix held an event in New York on Wednesday to give the world a sneak peek at everything to come over the next few months. According to Techaeris , this includes over 1,000 hours of new content in a variety of different genres in order to make sure you're never without something to binge again. Some of the most exciting reveals from the event include Orange is the New Black 's release date (June 9! Mark your calendars!), a first look at Casting JonBenét, the news that Kate McKinnon will lend her voice to Ms. Frizzle for Magic School Bus Rides Again , and the fact that The OA has been picked up for a second season. Check out all the glorious sneak peeks for 2017 below! Orange is the New Black (June 7) Casting JonBenét (April 28) Marvel's Iron Fist (March 17) Girlboss (April 21) Dear White People (April 28) Bill Nye Saves the World (April 21) Advertisement - Continue Reading Below
